sn23.2:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma radho bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn23.2:1.4: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, sattoti vuccati”ti?
sn23.2:1.5: “Rupe kho, radha, yo chando yo rago ya nandi ya tanha, tatra satto, tatra visatto, tasma sattoti vuccati.
sn23.2:1.9: vinnane yo chando yo rago ya nandi ya tanha, tatra satto, tatra visatto, tasma sattoti vuccati.
sn23.2:2.1: Seyyathapi, radha, kumaraka va kumarikayo va pamsvagarakehi kilanti.
sn23.2:2.2: Yavakivanca tesu pamsvagarakesu avigataraga honti avigatacchanda avigatapema avigatapipasa avigataparilaha avigatatanha, tava tani pamsvagarakani alliyanti kelayanti dhanayanti mamayanti.
sn23.2:2.3: Yato ca kho, radha, kumaraka va kumarikayo va tesu pamsvagarakesu vigataraga honti vigatacchanda vigatapema vigatapipasa vigataparilaha vigatatanha, atha kho tani pamsvagarakani hatthehi ca padehi ca vikiranti vidhamanti viddhamsenti vikilaniyam karonti.
sn23.2:2.4: Evameva kho, radha, tumhepi rupam vikiratha vidhamatha viddhamsetha vikilaniyam karotha tanhakkhayaya patipajjatha.
sn23.2:2.5: Vedanam vikiratha vidhamatha viddhamsetha vikilaniyam karotha tanhakkhayaya patipajjatha.
sn23.2:2.7: sankhare vikiratha vidhamatha viddhamsetha vikilaniyam karotha tanhakkhayaya patipajjatha.
sn23.2:2.8: Vinnanam vikiratha vidhamatha viddhamsetha vikilaniyam karotha tanhakkhayaya patipajjatha.
